00024 #ifndef _IMAGE_HPP_
00025 #define _IMAGE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00029 #include <memory>
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace util {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// wrapper class for using 'gd' graphics library
00038 class PWIZ_API_DECL Image
00039 {
00040     public:
00041 
00042     /// struct for holding rgb values (in [0,255])
00043     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Color
00044     {
00045         int red;
00046         int green;
00047         int blue;
00048 
00049         Color(int r=0, int g=0, int b=0) : red(r), green(g), blue(b) {}
00050     };
00051 
00052     static Color white() {return Color(255, 255, 255);}
00053     static Color black() {return Color(0, 0, 0);}
00054 
00055     /// struct for holding pixel coordinates
00056     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Point
00057     {
00058         int x;
00059         int y;
00060 
00061         Point(int _x=0, int _y=0) :  x(_x), y(_y) {}
00062     };
00063 
00064     enum PWIZ_API_DECL Align {Left=0x01, CenterX=0x02, Right=0x04, Top=0x08, CenterY=0x10, Bottom=0x20};
00065     enum PWIZ_API_DECL Size {Tiny, Small, MediumBold, Large, Giant};
00066 
00067     /// create an instance
00068     static std::auto_ptr<Image> create(int width, int height);
00069 
00070     /// draw pixel
00071     virtual void pixel(const Point& point, const Color& color) = 0;
00072 
00073     /// draw string 
00074     virtual void string(const std::string& text, const Point& point, const Color& color,
00075                         Size size=Large, int align=Left|Top) = 0;
00076 
00077     /// draw rectangle
00078     virtual void rectangle(const Point& point1, const Point& point2, const Color& color,
00079                            bool filled=true) = 0;
00080 
00081     /// draw circle
00082     virtual void circle(const Point& center, int radius, const Color& color, 
00083                         bool filled=true) = 0;
00084 
00085     /// draw line 
00086     virtual void line(const Point& point1, const Point& point2, const Color& color) = 0;
00087 
00088     /// set clipping rectangle 
00089     virtual void clip(const Point& point1, const Point& point2) = 0;
00090 
00091     /// write jpeg file 
00092     virtual bool writeJpg(const char* filename) const = 0;
00093 
00094     /// write png file
00095     virtual bool writePng(const char* filename) const = 0;
00096 
00097     virtual ~Image(){}
00098 };
00099 
00100 
00101 inline Image::Point operator+(const Image::Point& a, const Image::Point& b) 
00102 {
00103     return Image::Point(a.x+b.x, a.y+b.y);
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 inline Image::Point operator-(const Image::Point& a, const Image::Point& b) 
00108 {
00109     return Image::Point(a.x-b.x, a.y-b.y);
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 } // namespace util
00114 } // namespace pwiz

00116 
00117 #endif // _IMAGE_HPP_
